dp:metadata.dc:title: JR 11 - Bad Luck and Trouble (2007)
dp:metadata.dc:creator: Lee Child
dp:metadata.dc:description: From a helicopter high above the empty California desert, a man is sent free-falling into the night…. In Chicago, a woman learns that an elite team of ex–army investigators is being hunted down one by one.... And on the streets of Portland, Jack Reacher—soldier, cop, hero—is pulled out of his wandering life by a code that few other people could understand.
